title: Still cant patch game even after "fix" was sent out need some help
body: Earlier today i went though the patching loop and not looking at the boards i uninstalled lol and tried to re-install it. i've tried to repair the client still wont work.

replies.body: If you're still getting stuck in that patching loop, let's try hitting this from a couple different angles. First, make sure that you still have all of the right admin settings for League by updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Also grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and try running a **force repatch** as well. Let me know if that's able to help!

Did all the Perms also ran the Hextech tool still getting the loop when i launch


Nvm it just now decided to work thx for the help anyway

I can't either. I have to keep clicking retry just to scan files. I am at 11,359 at this time and I have no clue how many files there are. My hand and arm hurt now. I really wish someone from Riot would comment and help out.
